name: agentic-primitives
description: Production-grade plugins for Claude Code agents — SDLC, workspace observability, research tools, documentation, and meta-generators

sdlc.description: Software Development Lifecycle — commit, review, QA, testing, security hooks, git hooks, and infrastructure configuration

workspace.description: Observable isolated workspaces — lifecycle and observability hooks emitting structured JSONL events

research.description: Information gathering — web scraping, documentation extraction, and research tools

meta.description: Primitive generators — tools that create commands, skills, prompts, and other agentic primitives

docs.description: Documentation tools — Fumadocs integration and documentation management
